title: App discovery and downloads
content:
# Google Play Store App Guide

## Navigation
- **Bottom Navigation Bar**: Switch between **Games** (gaming focus), **Apps** (general applications), **Search** (find content), **Books** (e-books/audiobooks), and **You** (profile/library).
- **Top Tabs**: Within the "Apps" or "Games" tab, filter content by **For you**, **Top charts**, **Other devices** (Watch/TV), and **Kids**.
- **Profile**: Tap the **Profile Picture** (or "You" tab) to manage installed apps, updates, payments, and Play Protect settings.

## Search
- **Universal Search**: Tap the **"Search apps & games"** bar at the top or the **Search** tab at the bottom to find specific apps.
- **Discovery Chips**: Use the pill-shaped buttons below the search bar to browse categories like **"Stylized games"**, **"Action games"**, or **"Scary games"**.
- **Trending**: The search screen displays **"Trending searches"** (e.g., "pubg", "savana") and **"Events happening now"** for live in-game updates.

## Common Actions
- **Install Apps**: Search for an app (e.g., "Canara"), view its rating (e.g., "4.4*") and size (e.g., "62 MB"), then tap the blue **Install** button.
- **Check Updates**: Look for the **"Events happening now"** section in search to see "Major Updates" or time-limited events for your installed games.
- **Manage Payments**: Use the quick search chip labeled **"Send & manage payments"** or access the **You** tab to configure subscriptions and payment methods.

## Tips
- **Special Events**: The "For you" feed highlights **"Special event"** banners and **"Events happening now"** to keep you updated on limited-time game content.
- **Other Devices**: Use the **"Other devices"** tab at the top to find and install apps specifically designed for your smart watch or Android TV.
- **Ad Identification**: Sponsored results are clearly marked with a **"Sponsored"** tag or "Ad" label in search results.
